description: A joke highlighting Pavlov's scientific method with a twist on hair conditioning.
title: Pavlov's Conditioner
n_1: Pavlov discusses his experiments in a laboratory.
c2_1: What about your beard? It’s so soft!
n_2: Pavlov strokes his beard, looking thoughtful.
n_3: Pavlov chuckles, nodding at the clever connection.
c1_3: Exactly! But I use conditioner, not stimuli!
n_4: Both laugh, appreciating the witty exchange.
c1_4: Even scientists need their soft moments!
